div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 129 Peloponnesus, c. 1935 (800) Burial: 310-290 B.C. (Noe) Contents: 478+ AR Boeotia: 95 triob. Chalcis: 34 dr. Histiaea: 4 tetrob. Sicyon: 13 triob. Elis: 330 triob. Argos: 2 triob. Disposition: Athens BCH 1938, p. 447 Robert, Ã‰tudes, p. 194 The BCH records the hd. as coming from Macedonia but as Robert points out this is highly unlikely
